comment.author: Scott
comment.text: A tape comes out that has Trump saying "this is what I do". Women come forward and say, "yep, he did that to me". Trump and his supporters say they are lying. And people wonder why they didn't come forward when it happened!?! #rapeculture

replies.author: Rachel
replies.text: Roy Duckett go to Trump\s page and spew your hate there You know you're losing bigggggggggggggggg ly Blue up and down the ticket
